title: Cowboy II BESS
description: Lindsay Precast manufactured 69 custom grade beams for QCELLS' Cowboy II Battery Energy Storage System, providing the structural foundations for Tesla Megapack installation. The project required specialized engineering to accommodate the weight and mounting requirements of utility-scale battery units while meeting aggressive construction schedules.

cards.title: North Georgia Solar Farm
cards.subtitle: 5MW Installation - 2023
cards.description: Delivered 2,400 precision-engineered grade beams for QCELLS 5MW solar installation, completed 3 weeks ahead of schedule.

cards.title: Tennessee Valley Project
cards.subtitle: 10MW Installation - 2024
cards.description: Our largest QCELLS partnership to date, featuring 4,800 custom grade beams with advanced reinforcement specifications.
